channel.title: Comments on: Let’s do RAD later

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.content:encoded:
Just write down what to do with command line:

gnat make connect -IC:\gnat\2008\include\win32ada -LC:\gnat\2008\lib\win32ada

pretty alike gcc, well, it is gcc actually.

BTW, Claw is not as good as it announced, will not try any further.
